com.cube.storm.ui.quiz.fragment

Class StormQuizFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.cube.storm.ui.quiz.fragment.StormQuizFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class StormQuizFragment
extends Fragment
    Storm quiz fragment used for displaying individual quiz questions. Use this class to display each quiz question as a separate fragment in a view pager in conjunction to StormQuizActivity.

    To display a quiz page in a single list, use StormFragment with StormActivity.
